app.title: Thermostat
app.author: Moddable
app.description: A basic thermostat. You can change change the look of the product and add features with mods.

mods.title: Bubbles
mods.author: Moddable
mods.description: Display features in brightly colored bubbles

mods.title: Bubbles Plus
mods.author: Moddable
mods.description: Display features in brightly colored bubbles and add the time, date, and weather forecast

mods.title: Thermostat Plus
mods.author: Moddable
mods.description: Add the time, date, and weather forecast to the basic thermostat

mods.title: Slider
mods.author: Moddable
mods.description: Adjust the desired temperature using a rainbow slider
